name: Leap Club
long_description:
Leapclub.in is bringing farmerâ€™s markets online. With us customers can order fresh, healthy, pesticide & preservative free food from carefully vetted producers and get it delivered within 12 hours of harvesting or baking. This gives families a wide range of assortment to shop from.

We believe at Leap Club we can leverage technology to bring fresh healthy groceries and guide consumers to make choices that are good for them and the planet.
one_liner: Curated marketplace for healthy organic groceries
